articles.content:
THE POINT -- NOW ON YOUTUBE! 
In each episode of his weekly YouTube show, Chris Cillizza will delve a little deeper into the surreal world of politics. Click to subscribe!

articles.author: Anneken Tappe, CNN Business
articles.title: Dow surges as stocks recover from GameStop mania
articles.description: Wall Street is surging for a second day in a row as GameStop mania appears to be calming down. Reddit's favorite stock fell about 40% Tuesday, adding to Monday's sizable losses.

articles.author: Dan Merica, CNN
articles.title: Andrew Yang tests positive for Covid-19
articles.description: Andrew Yang, the former Democratic candidate for president who is currently running for mayor of New York City, tested positive for Covid-19 Tuesday, according to a statement from the Yang for NY Campaign team.
articles.content: (CNN)Andrew Yang, the former Democratic candidate for president who is currently running for mayor of New York City, tested positive for Covid-19 Tuesday, according to a statement from the Yang for N… [+292 chars]

articles.author: Rob Picheta, CNN
articles.title: Captain Tom Moore, who raised millions for NHS during first Covid-19 wave, dies aged 100 of the virus
articles.description: Tom Moore, the 100-year-old World War II veteran whose efforts to raise millions for the UK's National Health Service made him a universally adored icon during the first wave of the Covid-19 outbreak, has died in hospital after himself contracting the disease…
articles.content: London (CNN)Tom Moore, the 100-year-old World War II veteran whose efforts to raise millions for the UK's National Health Service made him a universally adored icon during the first wave of the Covid… [+550 chars]

articles.author: Jennifer Hansler, CNN
articles.title: Biden administration designates Myanmar military takeover as a coup
articles.description: The Biden administration has formally determined that the military takeover in Myanmar constitutes a coup d'état, a designation that requires the US to cut its foreign assistance to the country.
articles.content: Washington (CNN)The Biden administration has formally determined that the military takeover in Myanmar constitutes a coup d'état, a designation that requires the US to cut its foreign assistance to t… [+1932 chars]

articles.author: Lauren Fox, Alex Rogers and Chandelis Duster, CNN
articles.title: The Democrats won the Senate. Here's why they aren't in charge yet
articles.description: Democrats won the Senate, but they're not yet in charge until the chamber's party leaders strike a power-sharing agreement.

articles.author: Chauncey Alcorn, CNN Business
articles.title: UPS gives its Express delivery boxes a Black History Month makeover
articles.description: UPS is celebrating Black History Month with a special design on Express delivery packages, part of a campaign to support Black-owned small businesses.

articles.author: Matias Grez, CNN
articles.title: Stuart Baxter sacked by Indian football club Odisha over comments about rape
articles.description: Stuart Baxter has been sacked from his position as manager by Indian Super League club Odisha after making comments about rape during a post-match interview.

articles.author: Clare Foran and Ted Barrett, CNN
articles.title: Senate set to confirm Buttigieg and Mayorkas
articles.description: The Senate is on track to confirm Pete Buttigieg as transportation secretary and Alejandro Mayorkas as Homeland Security secretary on Tuesday.

articles.author: Matt Egan, CNN Business
articles.title: Sen. Warren wants answers on Robinhood ties to big hedge funds
articles.description: Senator Elizabeth Warren is demanding answers from Robinhood co-CEO Vlad Tenev over potential conflicts of interest caused by the free trading app's relationship with large hedge funds and other financial players.

articles.author: Matt Egan, CNN Business
articles.title: Exclusive: Elizabeth Warren wants answers on Robinhood's ties to large hedge funds
articles.description: Senator Elizabeth Warren is demanding answers from Robinhood co-CEO Vlad Tenev over potential conflicts of interest caused by the free trading app's relationship with large hedge funds and other financial players.

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: Analysis: Why Mitch McConnell chose this moment to condemn Marjorie Taylor Greene
articles.description: Nothing Mitch McConnell does is without a significant amount of thinking and strategy behind it. It's why he's in his seventh term representing Kentucky in the Senate -- and why he has been the chamber's leading Republican for more than a decade.

articles.author: Clare Duffy, CNN Business
articles.title: Pfizer expects $15B in 2021 Covid vaccine sales
articles.description: Pfizer expects to earn approximately $15 billion in revenue from its Covid-19 vaccine this year, the company said Tuesday.

articles.title: READ: Excerpts from Democrats' impeachment trial brief
articles.description: The House impeachment managers provided a detailed legal analysis in their pre-trial legal brief, filed Tuesday, about the constitutionality of charging Trump with incitement of insurrection. Excerpts of the brief are available below:
articles.content: (CNN)The House impeachment managers provided a detailed legal analysis in their pre-trial legal brief, filed Tuesday, about the constitutionality of charging Trump with incitement of insurrection. Ex… [+16898 chars]

articles.author: Jeremy Herb and Manu Raju, CNN
articles.title: Democrats' impeachment filing: Trump 'threatened the constitutional system'
articles.description: The House impeachment managers argue former President Donald Trump should be convicted for inciting the insurrection at the Capitol last month and barred from holding future office, charging that his actions "threatened the constitutional system that protects…
articles.content: (CNN)The House impeachment managers argue former President Donald Trump should be convicted for inciting the insurrection at the Capitol last month and barred from holding future office, charging tha… [+2944 chars]

articles.author: Jolie Kerr
articles.title: 14 seriously great practical gifts your valentine will love
articles.description: Giving a practical gift can be tricky, especially on a holiday like Valentine's Day that's associated with romance. But done right, a practical gift hits the sweet spot of items that are useful while still feeling special.
articles.content: Valentines Day typically isnt associated with giving practical gifts its an occasion usually thought of as the time to go big (jewelry!), sexy (lingerie!) or indulgent (chocolate and red wine!). But … [+5878 chars]

articles.author: Sara Ashley O'Brien, CNN Business
articles.title: Uber is betting $1.1 billion on alcohol deliveries
articles.description: Uber's future used to be self-driving cars. Now it's delivering alcohol.

articles.author: Josh Campbell and Eric Levenson, CNN
articles.title: FBI agents injured in shootout in Sunrise, Florida
articles.description: FBI agents were involved in a shootout with a suspect in the Fort Lauderdale, Florida, area on Tuesday morning, according to a law enforcement official familiar with the incident.

articles.author: Marianne Garvey, CNN
articles.title: Gayle King's daughter Kirby Bumpus got married at Oprah Winfrey's home
articles.description: Gayle King's daughter Kirby Bumpus and her longtime boyfriend Virgil Miller tied the knot at Oprah Winfrey's house in a socially distanced celebration in December, reports O Magazine.

articles.author: Paul LeBlanc and Veronica Stracqualursi, CNN
articles.title: Georgia state GOP lawmakers introduce voting restriction legislation
articles.description: GOP state senators in Georgia introduced a slate of bills on Monday that seek to roll back voter access in the state, such as "no excuse" absentee voting and automatic voter registration.
articles.content: Washington (CNN)GOP state senators in Georgia introduced a slate of bills on Monday that seek to roll back voter access in the state, such as "no excuse" absentee voting and automatic voter registrat… [+3207 chars]

articles.author: Aleks Klosok and John Sinnott, CNN
articles.title: After over a year out due to injury, Roger Federer will make tennis comeback in March in Doha
articles.description: Roger Federer will make his long-awaited return to tennis following double knee surgery at an ATP tournament in Doha, Qatar in March, his agent has confirmed to CNN Sport.

articles.author: Jordan Valinsky, CNN Business
articles.title: Marriott's CEO is reducing his schedule during pancreatic cancer fight
articles.description: Marriott International's president and CEO Arne Sorenson is reducing his demanding schedule for "several months" as he continues to fight pancreatic cancer.

articles.author: Lisa Respers France, CNN
articles.title: Dolly Parton hasn't gotten the coronavirus vaccine yet, even though she donated $1 million for it
articles.description: A newly 75-year-old Dolly Parton is eligible to be inoculated against Covid-19 but hasn't gotten a shot yet, she told CNN, even though she donated $1 million to vaccine development.

articles.author: Scottie Andrew, CNN
articles.title: If your loved one is hesitant to get the Covid-19 vaccine, share this
articles.description: To answer questions you or your loved ones may have about the Covid-19 vaccine, we consulted with two experts. The evidence supports the safety and efficacy of the two Covid-19 vaccines currently authorized.
articles.content: (CNN)Your loved ones are right to have questions about the Covid-19 vaccine -- the American public hasn't watched vaccine development this closely since Dr. Jonas Salk discovered how to immunize kids… [+7798 chars]

articles.title: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez says she is a survivor of sexual assault
articles.description: Democratic Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez opened up during an Instagram Live broadcast, in which she likened her situation to the trauma she experienced in the US Capitol riots.
